mapper.select: SELECT /* paintpcounsel.xml : paintp.paintpcounsel.selectPaIntpQna */ PQ.PA_COUNSEL_SEQ , PQ.PROC_GB , PQ.PA_CODE , PQ.PA_COUNSEL_NO , PQ.COUNSEL_SEQ , PQ.COUNSEL_DATE , PQ.COUNSEL_GB , PQ.PA_GOODS_CODE , PQ.PA_GOODS_DT_CODE , PQ.PA_ORDER_NO , '' AS REF_NO , PQ.ORDER_YN , PQ.DISPLAY_YN , PQ.PA_CUST_NO , PQ.CUST_NAME , PQ.CUST_TEL , PQ.RECEIPT_DATE , PQ.TRANS_YN , PQ.TRANS_DATE , PQ.INSERT_DATE , PQ.INSERT_ID , PQ.MODIFY_DATE , PQ.MODIFY_ID , PD.PA_COUNSEL_DT_SEQ , PD.TITLE , PQ.MSG_GB , PD.PROC_NOTE , PG.GOODS_CODE , PG.ENTP_CODE , (SELECT TO_CHAR(CODE_NAME) FROM TCODE TC WHERE TC.CODE_LGROUP = 'O511' AND TC.REMARK1 = '07' AND ROWNUM = 1) AS CUST_NO FROM TPAQNAM PQ , TPAQNADT PD , TPAPRODUCT PG , TPAINTPGOODS IG WHERE PQ.PA_COUNSEL_SEQ = PD.PA_COUNSEL_SEQ AND PQ.PROC_GB = PD.PROC_GB AND PQ.PA_GOODS_CODE = IG.PRD_NO AND IG.GOODS_CODE = PG.GOODS_CODE AND PQ.COUNSEL_SEQ IS NULL AND PQ.PROC_GB = '10' AND PQ.TRANS_YN = '0' AND PQ.TRANS_DATE IS NULL AND PD.PA_COUNSEL_DT_SEQ = '1' AND PQ.PA_CODE IN ('71', '72') AND PQ.INSERT_DATE > TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 3

SELECT /* paintpcounsel.xml : paintp.paintpcounsel.selectPaIntpUrgentQna */ PQ.PA_COUNSEL_SEQ , PQ.PROC_GB , PQ.PA_CODE , PQ.PA_COUNSEL_NO , PQ.COUNSEL_SEQ , PQ.COUNSEL_DATE , PQ.COUNSEL_GB , PQ.PA_GOODS_CODE , PQ.PA_GOODS_DT_CODE , PQ.PA_ORDER_NO , (SELECT PM.ORDER_NO FROM TPAORDERM PM WHERE PM.PA_CODE = PQ.PA_CODE AND PM.PA_ORDER_NO = PQ.PA_ORDER_NO AND PM.PA_ORDER_GB ='10' AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS REF_NO , PQ.ORDER_YN , PQ.DISPLAY_YN , PQ.PA_CUST_NO , PQ.CUST_NAME , PQ.CUST_TEL , PQ.RECEIPT_DATE , PQ.TRANS_YN , PQ.TRANS_DATE , PQ.INSERT_DATE , PQ.INSERT_ID , PQ.MODIFY_DATE , PQ.MODIFY_ID , PD.PA_COUNSEL_DT_SEQ , PD.TITLE , PQ.MSG_GB , PD.PROC_NOTE , '' GOODS_CODE , '' ENTP_CODE , (SELECT CODE_MGROUP FROM TCODE TC WHERE TC.CODE_GROUP = '07' AND TC.CODE_LGROUP = (SELECT TC1.REMARK FROM TCODE TC1 WHERE TC1.CODE_LGROUP = 'C031' AND TC1.CODE_MGROUP = '40') AND TC.REMARK = PQ.COUNSEL_GB AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS OUT_MGROUP_CODE , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM TCODE TC WHERE TC.CODE_LGROUP = 'O511' AND TC.REMARK1 = '07' ) AS CUST_NO FROM TPAQNAM PQ , TPAQNADT PD WHERE PQ.PA_COUNSEL_SEQ = PD.PA_COUNSEL_SEQ AND PQ.PROC_GB = PD.PROC_GB AND PQ.COUNSEL_SEQ IS NULL AND PQ.PROC_GB = '10' AND PQ.TRANS_YN = '0' AND PQ.TRANS_DATE IS NULL AND PD.PA_COUNSEL_DT_SEQ = '1' AND PQ.PA_GROUP_CODE = '07' AND PQ.INSERT_DATE > TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 3

SELECT /* paintpcounsel.xml : paintp.paintpcounsel.selectGoodsInfoExistOrderNo */ PRD_NO AS GOODS_CODE , MIN(SUBSTR(OPT_NO, 9,3)) AS GOODSDT_CODE FROM TPAINTPORDERLIST WHERE ORD_NO = #{orderNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PRD_NO = #{vendorItemId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY PRD_NO

SELECT /* paintpcounsel.xml : paintp.paintpcounsel.selectPaIntpAnsQna */ SQ.PA_COUNSEL_SEQ , SQ.PA_COUNSEL_NO , CD.PROC_NOTE , SQ.PA_CODE , CD.PROC_ID FROM TPAQNAM SQ , TCUSTCOUNSELM CM , TCUSTCOUNSELDT CD WHERE SQ.COUNSEL_SEQ = CM.COUNSEL_SEQ AND CM.COUNSEL_SEQ = CD.COUNSEL_SEQ AND CD.DO_FLAG = '40' AND CD.PROC_DATE > SYSDATE - 3 AND SQ.TRANS_YN = '0' AND SQ.MSG_GB = #{msgGb, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SQ.PA_GROUP_CODE = '07'
AND SQ.PA_COUNSEL_NO = #{paCounselNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT /* paintpcounsel.xml : paintp.paintpcounsel.selectPaQnaDtMaxSeq */ MAX(P.PA_COUNSEL_DT_SEQ) + 1 FROM TPAQNADT P WHERE P.PA_COUNSEL_SEQ = #{paCounselSeq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
